description: The Russian president says he has a police force for Belarus if unrest there "gets out of control".
title: Putin says he could send police to Belarus if necessary
title_page: Putin says he could send police to Belarus if necessary - BBC News
maintext: Separately, at least 13 journalists - including a BBC team - were detained in the centre of the capital, Minsk, ahead of a planned opposition protest. The interior ministry said they had been taken to a police station for identity checks, but the BBC's Steve Rosenberg said it was a "clear attempt to interfere with coverage of events".
